testCase.Title: Test case of CERT_PATH_TLS_SERVER_03
testCase.Purpose: Checks the behaviour of a TLS server when the target certificate that belongs to a TLS client contains an Extended Key Usage Extension that does not specify the clientAuth or anyExtendedKeyUsage key usage. This path is invalid. This path is invalid because the certificate must be used for the specified extended key usage which is not the one reserved for this type of application.
